Key Match Events: The Hawks went on a 13-1 run near the end of the fourth quarter, ultimately costing the Knicks the game
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks have now lost to a team with a record below.500, and they must make adjustments defensively after allowing 121 points to the Hawks
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks finished their road trip with a 1-2 record and will host the 1-6 Milwaukee Bucks on Friday
Rookie wing Zaccharie Risacher had a career-high 33 points and made six three-pointers
Others: Karl-Anthony Towns had a masterclass performance against Atlanta, scoring 34 points and grabbing 16 rebounds
Jalen Brunson's tough start to the season continued, with a lackluster defensive and decision-making performance
